channel.title: Windows 8
channel.description:
This seems odd but i thought id let everyone know.
Ive been testing Windows 8 Recently and the results of running Black Mesa On Windows 8 are far more impressive than what ive found on Windows 7.
I get various lag spikes mainly when i put the flashlight on and various other perfomance issues.
But.... When i play this in windows 8 on the same setting.... its perfectly fine :stuck_out_tongue:
Maybe windows 8 isnt as bad as people think :smiley:
[url=https://www.speedtest.net]![](upload://toqaJl3eatGIG4O2ICFosacSe6t.png)[/url]

item.title: Windows 8
item.dc:creator: The_MAZZTer
item.description:
Microsoft optimized some graphics code in Windows 8. They were quoting numbers on the Building Windows 8 blog IIRC.

Read full topic
